name: Random Quote
short_description: Import a Random Quote from Quotable.io, stoic-quotes.com, inspirational quotes, movie quotes, Lord of the Rings quotes, Game of Thrones quotes, Ron Swanson Quotes, Futurama quotes, Monty Python's Flying Circus quotes, anime quotes from Animechan, or quotes from Quotes on Design or API Ninja Quotes. Or, import jokes from JokesAPI or Dad jokes from icanhazdadjoke.com. Or, you could even pull a quote from your Roam Research Quotes page!
author: Mark Lavercombe
